sentences.en: Bend back the card and cut along the fold.
sentences.cn: 打开折好的卡纸，然后沿折痕剪开。

sentences.en: But as other shops fold, the march of the superstores continues.
sentences.cn: 但在其他商店纷纷关门倒闭之时，大型超市的强劲扩张势头却依旧不减。

sentences.en: Each fold in the skirt should be exactly the same width.
sentences.cn: 裙子每条皱折的宽度应该完全一样.

sentences.en: Fold in the beaten whites of two eggs.
sentences.cn: 加进两个打散的蛋白后搅匀.

sentences.en: Fold in the flour.
Fold the blanket back.
Fold the cream into the egg yolk mixture.
Fold the ironing board up so that it is flat.
Fold the letter and put it in an envelope.
Fold the omelette in half.
Fold the paper along the dotted line.
Gently fold in the whisked egg whites.
sentences.cn: 轻轻地调入搅拌好的蛋清。

sentences.en: Her dress hung in soft folds .
sentences.cn: 她的连衣裙垂下来，上面打着松松的褶子。

sentences.en: It’ll fit in if you fold it in half .
It’ll fit in if you fold it in half.
Make another fold and turn the ends together.
tables that fold flat for storage
The cost of a loaf of bread has increased five-fold.
sentences.cn: 一条面包的价钱增长了4倍。

sentences.en: These bunks can tip up and fold back into the wall.
sentences.cn: 这些铺位可以翻起来并折叠收入墙内.

sentences.en: This nippy new car has fold down rear seats.
sentences.cn: 这辆速度很快的新车配有可以放倒的后座。

words.tran_cn: 文件夹；折叠机；折叠式印刷品

phrases.tran_cn: 双手合拢，十指交叉地握住双手

trans.tran_cn: 褶子，褶痕，（岩石层）褶皱，羊圈，山谷
trans.tran_en: a line made in paper or material when you fold one part of it over another

trans.tran_cn: 折叠，折起，包裹，交叉，停业
trans.tran_en: to bend a piece of paper, cloth etc by laying or pressing one part over another
to bend a piece of paper, cloth etc by laying or pressing one part over another
